# Installing R {.unnumbered}

Before attending the course, make sure you have installed the most recent version of R and RStudio on your computer. If you are using a computer owned by Aarhus University, you can request administrative privileges to install R from the Heimdal Agent app.

Links for installation:

-   [R for Windows](https://cloud.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/)

-   [R for macOS](https://cloud.r-project.org/bin/macosx/)

-   [RStudio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/#download)
